text:
Arnie W. "Woo-Woo" Ginsburg (August 5, 1926 – June 26, 2020) was an American disc jockey.
He worked for the Boston radio market from the mid-1950s to the 1970s. Following this period, he became involved in the business side of radio as a business manager, president and owner of WVJV-TV.
He later was an executive with Pyramid Broadcasting and program manager of their Boston station WXKS/1430.
